attributes.action: Help Steven Cook get more Government backing
attributes.additional_details:
Steven Cook went missing on the 31st August/1st September 2005 in Malia, Crete. He has never been seen since, and a police investigation by the Greek police was inconclusive.

Steven's family are appealing to the government for the same amount of help that has been offered to the McCann's (37 dedicated officers from the Met. reviewing the information from the initial investigation)

Please help us by signing the petition and showing support for Stevens case.

www.findstevencook.co.uk

The Home Office is responsible for the government’s overall strategy and priorities on equality issues and aims to improve equality and reduce discrimination and disadvantage for all, at work, in public and political life, and in people’s life chances.
